summary: Attila, the leader of the barbarian Huns and called by the Romans "The Scourge of God", sweeps onto the Italian peninsula, defeating all of the armies of Rome, until he and his men reach the gates of the city itself.
cast: Anthony Quinn|Sophia Loren|Henri Vidal|Claude Laydu|Irene Papas|Colette Régis|Ettore Manni|Eduardo Ciannelli|Georges Bréhat|Christian Marquand|Guido Celano|Aldo Pini|Marco Guglielmi|Antonio Amendola|Richard Bakalyan|Fabio Bellisario|Fernando Birri|Mirella Di Lauri|Cristina Fantoni|Mario Feliciani|Piero Giagnoni|Carlo Hintermann|Dickie Jones|Edilio Kim|Renzo Malatesta|Scott Marlowe|Furio Meniconi|Aurelio Miserendino|Mimmo Palmara|Piero Pastore|Aldo Sprovieri|Mario Valente|Henri Vidon|Hank Bergman|Robert Rietty
title: Atila: Hombre o demonio
